channel.title: Arcane Revolution 317! RELEASED 4.0 CLIENT! NEW!;amazing graphics[ECO] [PVM]!
channel.description:
hey guys i want u people to try out arcane revoltuion... we're currently finishing up some update on a new release ARCANE REV 4.0 which has tons of new features! BEST SERVER EVER ONLINE ALMOST 24/7!! hella active/freindly owner FLAWLESS ECONEMY!!! to play arcane Revolution.. ---> webclient [url=http://arcanerevolution.webs.com/webclient]http://arcanerevolution.webs.com/webclient[/url] && homepage -----> [url=http://arcanerevolution.webs.com]http://arcanerevolution.webs.com[/url] ArcaneRevolution is an amazing entertaining server that just right for YOU! This server has a lot of amazing features that attracts our players. Such as an excellent PK system, 700+ items, Donator zone, and more! We try our best to make our players feel welcome. So why not join today! ADDING HEEPS NEW CONTENT IN ARCANE REV 4.0 SOON RELEASE... PLEASE GO ON FORUMS OR PLAY THE SERVER.. SOME BENFITS FOR 4.0 WILL BE NEW ADDED CUSTOMS,BOSS'S MINIGAMES NPC'S TELEPORTS ECT!! What ArcaneRevolution serves:
- 700+ items and 508+ maps - Bosses such as Bork, Tormented Demons, Corporal Beast, and more!.. Bork and Avatar of destruction drop rares such as steads ad glaives and korasi. - Excellent PK system - Donator zone (Benefits and good features) - 100% working combat calculator (Accurate hits) - and much more! in need of players atm, i just released this server to the public, staff positions available, but overtime you will earn a staff position from helping applying on forums, vouches ect. COME ALONG
ADDED [size=14pt]VOTE4CASH!![/size] i just recently added a new cool minigame ::customs, kill the npc`s for Arcane Points, and earn your way to some customs and in game items, shop will grow in future. the npc`s have around 2000 hp and are made so u can`t afk kill them. after killing the npc`s at ::customs you receive 7 Arcane Points per kill, the items in the shop are fairly priced.
~things to happen ADDING much more boss's ADDING new npc's ADDING new minigames ADDING new items + loyalty items ADDING new CUSTOMS completed: added few customs such as the double hitting [color=pink]pink whip[color=green] added [color=blue]chaotic claws added [color=teal]DRYGORE MACE, LONGSWORD, AND RAPIER! [color=yellow]and R[color=red]A[color=black]I[color=blue]N[color=green]B[color=maroon]O[color=black]W [color=black]PHAT![/color][/color] [/color][/color][/color][/color][/color][/color][/color][/color][/color][/color] Added Custom weapons such as MP5 Dragunov Desert eagle Black Wings Uzi white wings!!! [u]the 2 owners Creative and Positive are amazigly active and are not strict F***** like other owners.. we listen to what you have to say and joke around :)[/u] [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eO1G7EX6nh8[/youtube] --> customs sneek peek
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iKdUq6PtkK4[/youtube] --->[size=12pt] quick run through of Arcane Rev[/size] ~also hosting a few drop partys soon :3 so hurry and check arcane out

item.title: Arcane Revolution 317! RELEASED 4.0 CLIENT! NEW!;amazing graphics[ECO] [PVM]!
item.dc:creator: @1337_c0d3r 1337 c0d3r
item.description:
@1337_c0d3r wrote:

hey guys i want u people to try out arcane revoltuion… we’re currently finishing up some update on a new release ARCANE REV 4.0 which has tons of new features! BEST SERVER EVER ONLINE ALMOST 24/7!! hella active/freindly owner
FLAWLESS ECONEMY!!! to play arcane Revolution… —> webclient http://arcanerevolution.webs.com/webclient && homepage -----> http://arcanerevolution.webs.com
ArcaneRevolution is an amazing entertaining server that just right for YOU! This server has a lot of amazing features that attracts our players. Such as an excellent PK system, 700+ items, Donator zone, and more! We try our best to make our players feel welcome. So why not join today!
ADDING HEEPS NEW CONTENT IN ARCANE REV 4.0 SOON RELEASE… PLEASE GO ON FORUMS OR PLAY THE SERVER… SOME BENFITS FOR 4.0 WILL BE NEW ADDED CUSTOMS,BOSS’S MINIGAMES NPC’S TELEPORTS ECT!!
What ArcaneRevolution serves:

  • 700+ items and 508+ maps
  • Bosses such as Bork, Tormented Demons, Corporal Beast, and more!.. Bork and Avatar of destruction drop rares such as steads ad glaives and korasi.
  • Excellent PK system
  • Donator zone (Benefits and good features)
  • 100% working combat calculator (Accurate hits)
  • and much more!
    in need of players atm, i just released this server to the public, staff positions available, but overtime you will earn a staff position from helping applying on forums, vouches ect. COME ALONG

ADDED [size=14pt]VOTE4CASH!![/size]
i just recently added a new cool minigame ::customs, kill the npcs for Arcane Points, and earn your way to some customs and in game items, shop will grow in future. the npcs have around 2000 hp and are made so u cant afk kill them. after killing the npcs at ::customs you receive 7 Arcane Points per kill, the items in the shop are fairly priced.

~things to happen
ADDING much more boss’s
ADDING new npc’s
ADDING new minigames
ADDING new items + loyalty items
ADDING new CUSTOMS
completed:
added few customs such as the double hitting [color=pink]pink whip[color=green] added [color=blue]chaotic claws added [color=teal]DRYGORE MACE, LONGSWORD, AND RAPIER! [color=yellow]and R[color=red]A[color=black]I[color=blue]N[color=green]B[color=maroon]O[color=black]W [color=black]PHAT![/color][/color]
[/color][/color][/color][/color][/color][/color][/color][/color][/color][/color]
Added Custom weapons such as MP5 Dragunov Desert eagle Black Wings Uzi white wings!!!
the 2 owners Creative and Positive are amazigly active and are not strict F***** like other owners… we listen to what you have to say and joke around
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eO1G7EX6nh8[/youtube] --> customs sneek peek

[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iKdUq6PtkK4[/youtube] —>[size=12pt] quick run through of Arcane Rev[/size]
~also hosting a few drop partys soon :3 so hurry and check arcane out
